name: BlackFox
description:
New online shooter!

BlackFox is a fast-paced, action-packed first-person shooter.

The game is currently in alpha testing.

  • 8 weapons
  • 1 card
  • 3 mode
  • And lots of fun!

In the plans:

  • New game modes (Search and Destroy, Bomb Plant, Arms Race, Battle Royale)
  • Rating Games ("Planting the Bomb")
  • New knives, grenades, and other weapons
  • More cards
  • New skins and the ability to exchange them between players
  • New functionality
  • Fixing bugs
  • Voice chat
